name: Gangstar Mafia Crime City War
description:
Play a role of a gangster in this game, and fight as a real-life hero to save city from drug mafia and crime gangs, which have destroyed the peace of the beautiful Miami city.

You have an open world environment to play around in the game, fight with gangster and bad cops, save people, you are a good gangster who helps others to live peacefully.

Play multiple mission and fight with crime mafia to stop drugs circulation in the city.

· Open World City Environment
· An identical copy of Miami city
· Beautiful rich realistic graphics
· Day and Night auto scene switch
· Drive cars, bikes, buses, vans, fire truck etc.
· Multiple mini missions
· Multiple mini games
· Multiple weapons
· Smooth and fluent animations
· Energy boosting sounds
